resources.string: Hello World, Splash!
Fuel 4 Fueled
We\'ll ask you and your friends some questions, compile your answers, and make a recommendation or two. Once you all decide, we\'ll post to facebook to let everyone know you\'re out to lunch.
Time to get some om nom noms? That\'s cool.
What kind of food are you in the mood for?
How far are you willing to travel for this fabled feast?
How many stars should this place have (rating wise)?
Something asian...
Classic American! Burgers! Wings! Fried stuff!
I\'m digging some Italian.
Can I get some Middle Eastern?
I\m a vegetarian/vegan. Have something for me?
Give me some Mexican!
Look, as long as it\'s not *awful*...
3 or above seems acceptable
4.5 and above or bust!
Across the street. Tops.
Moderate walking distance please.
Anywhere in the city is fine.
When you\'re done...
Once you and your colleagues have made your selections, click the button below and follow the instructions to share information.
Alright! Press the \'Bump!\' button below to exchange info with your colleagues. Once you\'ve exchanged with everyone, press the \'Done\' button.
